message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value proposition, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000. I believe this represents a fair starting point for our discussion.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I could meet you halfway between our two offers. How about $1,000,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above that price. How about we try $950,000? I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I see the value you place on this, I have to be firm on my end. My final offer is $975,000.  This is a significant discount and reflects my best possible price.
